name: Granny Magnet 2: The Unprecedented Sequel
description:
Bug: The game will automatically say you're dead and to restart with "Enter"... this is incorrect, you should press "R" to restart. It's a game jam entry and I am unable to resubmit. A game about zombie robot grannies pulling themselves towards you! How long can you survive? 

Art - Dylan Hancox 

Sound - Hamza Khan

Development - Robbie Woods
